N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 456.3 - Publicizing information and referral services

State Regulations
(a) Each local social services department
shall publicize the availability of information and referral services to the
community and to public and private agencies. (b) In order to assure the widest possible
dissemination of this information throughout the district, the following means, among others, shall be used: (1)
mass media
(local television, radio, newspapers and magazines); (2)
pamphlets and flyers available in the
headquarters of each social services department and in each local office
thereof and distributed to the Social Security Administration, hospitals, nursing homes, intermediate care facilities, proprietary homes, and other
appropriate community locations; and
(3)
posters displayed in prominent
locations. Notes
